challengeName: topcoder Community Site - Add Dev Challenges with Data Science tag to Data Science Track
detailedRequirements:
In this First2Finish challenge, we want to start displaying DEVELOPMENT "code" challenges that have the "Data Science" technology tag in the Data Science track of challenge lists (i.e. http://www.topcoder.com/challenges/data/) 

To accomplish this, we'll need to start making a separate API call to query against all the DEVELOPMENT "code" challenges that have "Data Science" technology tag. This should be done in the existing services and controllers that pull challenges into the "data science" challenge listings tab. Note that this change will only apply to the data science tab. Here are a few more notes/requirements:

- The open, past and upcoming challenges tabs should all be updated.

- This change should follow the style of existing code; i.e., it should be Angular and not use jQuery or an unnecessary DOM manipulation

- The API calls should look something like this: https://api.topcoder.com/v2/challenges/active?challengeType=Code&technologies=Data+Science&type=develop

- These challenges should be pulled into the same grid that all the data science challenges are and displayed with all the same fields

- The links should point to develop challenges

- But, the links in the listing should use the green 'code' icon

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Resources and Guidelines:
- Latest theme and plugin available on GitLab https://gitlab.com/topcoderinc/tc-site/tree/master. You will need to create an account in GitLab if you haven't had yet, once you register for this challenge, send us GitLab login to jamesmarquez@gmail.com and we will add you to the developers group on a repo in GitLab. This will give you access to work on issues, create branches, and pull requests.
- Data is available on https://github.com/topcoderinc/tc-site-data 
- Please follow the guideline in our GitLab repo 

Quick Installation guide :
1. Activate theme and plugin
2. Import provided XML file
3. Set home as front page
4. Set permalink to %post_name%
5. Please install site on local.topcoder.com (add to hosts file), so your local site can read tcsso and tcjwt cookie
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
- Please submit updated files and Patch file

- a simple deployment guide with verification screenshots.

- Once the winner is declared, create a branch and submit merge request
